tags: that's my take on end game and tony's fate
summary: Some people think Tony is not the type that would retire. They say Tony would keep on worrying about protecting Earth and thus...
body:
Some people think Tony is not the type that would retire. They say Tony would keep on worrying about protecting Earth and thus the only ending for him is to sacrifice his life.

People tend to forget that Captain Marvel is coming, one that is the strongest character in the MCU so far as per Kevin Feige.

Tony hoped for a means to protect the world like a bouncer in the sky. That’s what Ultron was supposed to be. Who else has the means to guard Earth via space? Captain Marvel. In the comics, she is the commander of the Alpha Flight Space Program; simply put it is the bouncer in the sky.

Once Tony’s assured that Earth is in good hands, his fight is over then he can retire and go home with Pepper.

Once Tony’s assured that Earth is in good hands, his fight is over then he can retire and go home with Pepper.

summary: Marvel Studios: Anyway, we’re finally ready to tell you that Jude Law’s character in Captain Marvel is...............
body:
Marvel Studios: Anyway, we’re finally ready to tell you that Jude Law’s character in Captain Marvel is………… Mar-Vell!

Literally everyone who knows anything at all about Captain Marvel and her origin story: Wow. I’m so shocked. Color me surprised. Who could’ve guessed it.

reblog.comment:

summary: Jude Law protagonista della nuova foto di Captain Marvel
title: Jude Law protagonista della nuova foto di Captain Marvel
body:
#JudeLaw protagonista della nuova foto di #CaptainMarvel

Fandango ha rilasciato in queste ore una nuova foto ufficiale tratta da Captain Marvel, il cinecomic Marvel Studios diretto da Anna Boden e Ryan Fleck.

Il nuovo scatto mostra Brie Larson in compagnia di Jude Law, quest’ultimo nei panni di Mar-Vell, storico leader della Starforce. Il ruolo dell’attore è stato finora al centro di speculazioni da parte della stampa in rete, a tal proposito,…

summary: Captain Marvel: Jude Law in uniforme in una nuova immagine
title: Captain Marvel: Jude Law in uniforme in una nuova immagine
body:
Captain Marvel: Jude Law in uniforme in una nuova immagine

Jude Law guida una squadra di guerrieri Kree in una nuova immagine da Captain Marvel, il cinecomic Marvel Studios atteso per il prossimo anno.

Il nuovo Capitano arriverà nei cinema a marzo e presenterà ai fan Carol Danvers, interpretata da Brie Larson, prima che il suo potente personaggio arrivi ad aiutare gli eroi più potenti della Terra in Avengers: Endgame. Danvers non sarà l’unico…

blog.description: Welcome to Daily Marvel Heroes! This blog is dedicated to characters in the Marvel universe, whether it's live-action, comics or animation. You can find gifs, updates and various resources about the universe on this page. We track #dailymarvelheroes, in case you wanted us to check out your edits!

summary: Jude Law’s Mystery Role In 'Captain Marvel' Officially Revealed
body:
Jude Law’s Mystery Role In ‘Captain Marvel’ Officially Revealed

Jude Law’s role in Captain Marvel has been officially revealed in Captain Marvel and it’s…exactly who you think it is. A new slide for the upcoming female superhero film reveals that Jude Law is playing Mar-Vell, the leader of Starforce. So everyone who guessed and speculated about Law’s mystery role in the film, you were right on the money.

The official Captain Marvel page on Disney’s website has a slide revealing that Jude Law will play the Mar-Vell role. While there was speculation to this since his casting, there was nothing concrete. And Jude Law himself had denied in interviews that he was going to play Mar-Vell in the Captain Marvel film. Well, actors do have to protect their roles, after all. Consider: Benedict Cumberbatch denied that he was playing Khan in Star Trek Into Darkness. Marion Cotillard denied playing Talia in The Dark Knight Rises.

summary: Disney Reveals Jude Law's Character Name in Captain Marvel
title: Disney Reveals Jude Law's Character Name in Captain Marvel
body:
Disney Reveals Jude Law’s Character in Captain Marvel

The confusion about who Jude Law is playing in Captain Marvel may have just hit binary levels.

Previously, a Funko! Pop leak claimed that Jude Law was playing Yon-Rogg in Captain Marvel. However Disney’s official movies site reveals something differently. If you go to the site here and scroll through the images, the one with Jude Law says, “Jude Law as Mar-Vell, the leader of Starforce.”

It…

View On WordPress

summary: Got these two responses to my last Shazam post and, even though I’m keenly aware that folks are really here for the art, I’ve...
caption: Got these two responses to my last Shazam post and, even though I’m keenly aware that folks are really here for the art, I’ve got some thoughts on this that I’ll get around to making a more cogent response with at some point. Just wanted to say thanks as well. The two clips in that post were from a Shazam design I had in my back pocket just in case, which (and I can tell would have been to the chagrin of many) kept the hood.

reblog.comment: Got these two responses to my last Shazam post and, even though I’m keenly aware that folks are really here for the art, I’ve got some thoughts on this that I’ll get around to making a more cogent response with at some point. Just wanted to say thanks as well. The two clips in that post were from a Shazam design I had in my back pocket just in case, which (and I can tell would have been to the chagrin of many) kept the hood.

The two clips in that post were from a Shazam design I had in my back pocket just in case, which (and I can tell would have been to the chagrin of many) kept the hood.

summary: ISIS case: Patiala House turns into fortress as 10 accused produced before court
title: ISIS case: Patiala House turns into fortress as 10 accused produced before court
body:
ISIS case: Patiala House turns into fortress as 10 accused produced before court

New Delhi:

The Patiala House court complex in the heart of the national capital turned into a fortress on Thursday when 10 people arrested on the suspicion of being members of an ISIS-inspired group and allegedly planning suicide attacks and serial blasts, were produced in the court amidst tight security.

The security was tightened since afternoon and around 20-25 personnel of the CRPF were…
